title: 4 Collections of Paranormal Videos That Will...
text:
Paranormal Phenomena Expert By Stephen Wagner 
If a picture is worth a thousand words, how much more valuable is a video or film? Getting hard evidence for the paranormal is difficult because by its very nature it is fleeting, unpredictable and spontaneous. Yet every once in awhile -- thanks to the proliferation of security and surveillance cameras, and video cameras on our ubiquitous phones -- videos that capture paranormal events are becoming more numerous. 
Of course we still have to be careful and skeptical because the same advanced technology that allows all these videos also makes it easier than ever to create fakes and hoaxes. 
Some very good videos can be found in the collections below, however. It's nearly impossible to verify the authenticity of all of them, but they are presented here for your critical eye: The Best Ghost Videos Ever Taken - some of the most intriguing ghost and poltergeist videos around. Ghost Videos from Around the World - taken in various locations. Bigfoot Videos - some of the best, most interesting videos of possible Bigfoot or Sasquatch. Paranormal Videos from Readers - reader-submitted videos of ghosts, shadow people, exorcisms, and more phenomena. Best Videos: Disneyland Ghost. 
Good videos of ghosts are the "Holy Grail" of ghost investigation, but they are extremely difficult to get. Yet these videos rank high as being authentic and truly mysterious. They are the best ghost videos ever taken. More » 
continue reading below our video What Do Movie Ratings Mean? Del Mar shadowman. South Coast Paranormal With the widespread use of video cameras, cell phone video and surveillance video, more and more videos of possible ghosts are surfacing. Here are several for your review. More » Ukraine Bigfoot. SDNikitin A collection of videos that might show the creature known as Bigfoot, Sasquatch, Skunkape or Yeti. More » Russian Exorcism - March 2007. ~ Eugene Safronov
